sourcesContent:
export const URL = "";

export const getApi = (path: string, params: string) => 
    fetch(`${URL}/${path}?${params}`)
    .then((res) => res.json)
    .catch((err) => Promise.reject(err))

export const postApi = (path: string, data: any) => 
    fetch(`${URL}/${path}`,{
        method:"POST",
        body: data
    })
    .then((res) => res.json())
    .catch((err) => Promise.reject(err))
